description.en: Web search, AI search, and semantic reranking powered by Bocha API
description.zh: 基于博查 API 的网络搜索、AI 搜索和语义重排

description.en: Advanced web search with AI-generated answers, images, and multiple search modes
description.zh: 高级网络搜索，支持 AI 生成答案、图片和多种搜索模式

description.en: Advanced Excel parser with formula, date, number format support. Offline-ready with bundled SheetJS.
description.zh: 增强版 Excel 解析器，支持公式、日期、数字格式化。内置 SheetJS 库，离线可用。

description.en: Parse CSV/TSV files into model context to enhance responses
description.zh: 解析 CSV 文件（.csv, .tsv）置入模型上下文，用于增强模型回答

description.en: Manage multiple AI models and switch between them quickly
description.zh: 管理多个 AI 模型配置，快速切换使用

description.en: Enhanced rendering with math formulas (KaTeX), diagrams (Mermaid), code copy buttons. Fully offline.
description.zh: 增强渲染：数学公式 (KaTeX)、流程图 (Mermaid)、代码复制按钮。完全离线可用。

description.en: Parse web pages for chat context. Choose browser parsing, Firecrawl API, or Jina Reader.
description.zh: 将网页解析为聊天上下文。可选浏览器解析、Firecrawl API 或 Jina Reader。

description.en: Demonstrates toolbar button extension API: button registration, active/loading states, and fullscreen modal.
description.zh: 展示工具栏按钮扩展 API：按钮注册、激活态/加载态、全屏模态框等功能。
